question: 1.Why the chapters of Fazal-e-Hajj and Fazal-e-Darood have been removed from the Fazal-e-Ammal
answer:
QUESTION
1.Why the chapters of Fazal-e-Hajj and Fazal-e-Darood have been removed from the Fazal-e-Ammal. 2.Is there no need to tell Umma of there Fazal any more. 3.Had mollana Zakaria written these fazal too. 4.do contents of these fazal (faza-e-Hajj and faza-e-darood)cotradicts the basic teaching of Islam? and have been removed due to the extreme pressure of Ulama?
ANSWER


Share:
1. We are completely unaware of this.
2. It is quite obvious that there exists a dire need to educate the Ummah
regarding every aspect of Deen, be it Hajj, Durood or any other matter of
Deen.
3. Yes.
4. We do not accept this accusation and we also condemn such baseless claims. If there are any specific aspects in these books regarding which you have reservations, kindly forward it to us.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Muhammad ibn Moulana Haroon Abassommar
FACULTY OF SPECIALTY IN HADITH SCIENCES

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai (Fatwa Department)
